title: I want to play on the PBE too!
body:
So upon recent research, i found that the way to get into PBE is to apply with a high activity account on an NA/EUW/EUNE server.
i'm not insulting the method itself, but i would really like to get into the PBE, but i only have an OCE acc.
i know the PBE servers are in NA and the ping would be through the roof, but i don't care! i want PBE!

RITO Plz!?

replies.body: Everyone wants to play on PBE, but in the end, it's for Riot to test out future patches, not just for your entertainment >.<
